# CCTOP Dummy Data Generator Requirements
# Python dependencies for data generation scripts

# No external dependencies required - uses only Python standard library:
# - sqlite3 (built-in)
# - random (built-in)
# - datetime (built-in)
# - json (built-in)
# - os (built-in)
# - argparse (built-in)
# - pathlib (built-in)
# - typing (built-in)

# Optional: For enhanced data generation (future extensions)
# faker>=18.0.0
# numpy>=1.21.0
# pandas>=1.3.0
